attributes.action: ban the use of chimpanzees in entertainment and advertising
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chimpanzees used in television shows, movies, circuses and advertising are taken away from their mothers at a very young age. They are trained to perform unnatural acts. Often they have their front teeth removed to prevent biting.
 
When they reach maturity they are six times sronger then humans and become uncontrollable. At this point they are discarded, often sold to biomedical research facilities or zoos.
